Package parser

Class Delimiters

java.lang.Object
parser.Delimiters
public class Delimiters
extends java.lang.Object
Represents delimiters and allows to split content based on default or given string of delimiters.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String delimiters
    String of delimiters.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Delimiters()
    Creates default delimiters.
    Delimiters​(java.lang.String delimiters)
    Creates delimiters with given string.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private java.lang.String format​(java.lang.String delimiters)
    Changes string of delimiters in order to use in regular expression.
    java.lang.String getDelimiters()
    Gets string of delimiters.
    void setDelimiters​(java.lang.String delimiters)
    Changes delimiters.
    java.lang.String[] splitPage​(java.lang.String textFromDoc)
    Splits given text using defined delimiters.

    • format

      private java.lang.String format​(java.lang.String delimiters)
      Changes string of delimiters in order to use in regular expression.
      Parameters:
      delimiters - String of delimiters.
      Returns:
      String of formatted delimiters, so that any of matching symbols can be found.

    • splitPage

      public java.lang.String[] splitPage​(java.lang.String textFromDoc)
      Splits given text using defined delimiters.
      Parameters:
      textFromDoc - String that needs to be split.
      Returns:
      Split text in array.
